ygData.subject: Coming of Terminess

Subject: Coming of Terminess
Message-ID: <8ir6ji+ipb2@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 2273

From: minime_316@...

"Shhh! Be quiet. If we got, we'll be killed!"

A small group of Predacons, lead by Terminess, was trying to snaek 
into a Maximal stronghold on Cybertron. They needed the valuable 
information that the Maximals had. Terminess was bright, and was 
known to have strange psychic powers. She could change things, and 
make things move with her mind. It was amaxing. Many believe this was 
because she was another daughter of StarScream, but there is nothing 
to point to this that it is true. She carefully moved towards the 
main computer, when a voice called to her.

"Freeze!"

25 Maximals stood their. She only had a group of 5. She didn't want 
to waste her life, so she surrendered. After a few days she was 
brought before the high council. Optimal Optimus gave her sentence.

"Terminess, you have been found guilty of treason. We sentence you to 
spend the reast of your days in stasis, travelling the Universe in a 
stasis pod. We have plotted a course that will keep leading in 
circles. We are giving siganls to all planets not to touch your pod. 
You should be greatful. It may feel like we are giving you death, but 
it is actually eternal life.

After a few more days, Terminess was taken to be placed in her pod. 
But she had other ideas. After the pod is launched, it will take 5 
cycles for the stasis to take affect. That's all the time she needed. 
After she was launched, she used her mind skills to hack into the 
computer and change her course. She altered it to head to the warp 
portal. In a few mega-cycles she went off course, much to the 
surprise of the council. She dissapeared into the warp and was never 
seen on cybertron again.

The pod was travelling fast towards Past Earth. Terminess, unconcious 
inside the pod, was unaware of what was happening. The pod crashed on 
her with the thud. The pod began the DNA scanning and brought her out 
of stasis. When she left the pod she found she had six legs, a 
chooper at the fron and an antenna! She had aquired the Beast Mode of 
a termite. She TF'd and began to laugh.

"I did it! I outsmarted the Maximals! I outsmarted Cybertron!" said 
Terminess, pulling out her poison blaster., "Now I can use my talents 
in an actual war. It's time for Terminess to make an impact on the 
Neo Beast Wars."
